articles.title: 'There Are Better Fast Bowlers in Indian T20 Cricket Than Mohammed Shami' - News18

articles.content: Australian legend Ricky Ponting feels Mohammed Shamis strength lies in the longest format and there are better quick bowlers in Indias T20 set up, weighing in on his absence from the Asia Cup squad.… [+2708 chars]
